hero.title: Discover God's Word Together
hero.subtitle: Join our vibrant community of teenage believers

intro.title: Welcome to Antura Kiristina
intro.description: We're dedicated to helping teenagers explore and understand the Bible in a fun, engaging, and relevant way. Our programs are designed to foster spiritual growth, build lasting friendships, and equip young people to live out their faith.

bibleStudy.title: Weekly Bible Study
bibleStudy.description: Dive deep into God's Word every Wednesday evening.

summerCamp.title: Summer Camp
summerCamp.description: Join us for an unforgettable week of faith and fun!

worshipNights.title: Worship Nights
worshipNights.description: Experience powerful worship with other teens monthly.

posts.title: 5 Ways to Study the Bible Effectively
posts.description: Discover practical tips to enhance your Bible study time and deepen your understanding of Scripture. Learn how to apply these methods in your daily life.

posts.title: Dealing with Peer Pressure as a Christian Teen
posts.description: Learn how to stand firm in your faith while navigating social challenges. Discover strategies to maintain your values in various situations.

posts.title: The Power of Youth-Led Worship
posts.description: Explore how young people are transforming worship experiences in churches today. Learn about the impact of youth involvement in ministry.

about.title: About Antura Kiristina
about.subtitle: Empowering Christian Teens to Live Out Their Faith

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Producing a young people who are built by the word of God, filled with the Holy Spirit, and who are influencers of righteousness

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Seeing a young people who are built by the word of God, filled with the Holy Spirit, and who are influencers of righteousness

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: "Antura Christianity" was launched in 2009 as a TV show based on 2 Peter 3:15. This service was a program that was presented on Elshadai television for four consecutive years, and it was started mainly to answer questions about Christianity.
history.paragraph2: During this ministry, when it saw the problems in various churches, it realized that the problems were vast and complex. Based on this situation, through prayer and consultation with a few of it friends, it came to the conclusion that if the church needs to bring lasting change to itself and the community, it should focus on young adults (15-17 years old).
history.paragraph3: It believed that in order for these young people to be influential, they need holistic support from the family, the church, and the ministries. Therefore, the service started in 2011 by accepting 11 students for a one-year "Basic Apologetics" and teaching them and holding various seminars and discussions. It currently has four full-time employees and the learning centers have grown to two. The enrollment capacity has increased to fifty students.

biblicalTruth.title: Biblical Truth
biblicalTruth.description: We are committed to teaching and living out the timeless truths of God's Word.

authenticCommunity.title: Authentic Community
authenticCommunity.description: We foster genuine relationships where teens can be themselves and grow together.

servantLeadership.title: Servant Leadership
servantLeadership.description: We empower young people to lead by example and serve others with humility.

joyfulWorship.title: Joyful Worship
joyfulWorship.description: We celebrate God's goodness through vibrant, Christ-centered worship.

inclusiveFellowship.title: Inclusive Fellowship
inclusiveFellowship.description: We welcome all teens, regardless of their background or faith journey.

lifelongDiscipleship.title: Lifelong Discipleship
lifelongDiscipleship.description: We encourage continuous growth and learning in faith beyond the teenage years.

cta.title: Join Our Community
cta.description: Whether you're a teen looking to grow in your faith, a parent seeking a supportive community for your child, or an adult interested in volunteering, we'd love to welcome you to the Antura Kiristina family.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you!

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.name: Name
form.submitSuccess: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you soon!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: What age group does Antura Kiristina serve?
faq.answer1: We primarily serve teenagers between the ages of 13 and 19.
faq.question2: How can I volunteer with Antura Kiristina?
faq.answer2: Visit our Volunteer page to learn about opportunities and fill out an application.
faq.question3: Are your events open to non-members?
faq.answer3: Most of our events are open to all teens. Some special events may require registration.
faq.question4: How can I support Antura Kiristina financially?
faq.answer4: You can make a donation through our website or contact us for other giving options.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Sign up for our newsletter to receive the latest blog posts and updates.

studentRegistration.title: Student Registration
studentRegistration.description: Please fill out the form below to register as a student.

form.q1: Do you believe in the divine authority of Selassie's teachings? If so, how do you understand his teachings?
form.q2: How do you understand the teaching that 'salvation is by faith alone'? What does it mean?
form.q3: How do you understand the role of works in the doctrine of salvation?
form.q4: What do you think the Bible teaches about human nature? Is a person made up of body, soul, and spirit together, or is a person a spirit within a body?
form.q5: Do you think God needs to permit or influence human will to fulfill any of His purposes on earth? Provide reasons for your answer!
form.q6: What do you think is the relationship between the true Gospel and material wealth on earth?
form.q7: Do you think the Gospel promotes material prosperity?
form.q8: In the doctrine of salvation, do you believe that when people are born again in God by believing in Christ, they attain a status equal to God? If not, what status do they achieve?
form.q9: What difference do you think there is between Christ's sonship to the Father and the believers' sonship to God? Or is it the same kind of sonship?

volunteerRegistration.title: Volunteer Registration
volunteerRegistration.description: Please fill out the form below to register as a volunteer. Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.

volunteerForm.serviceAreasQuestion: In which area would you like to serve
volunteerForm.availabilityFrequencyQuestion: How often would you like to serve

student1.name: Etsubawit
student1.content: In 2009, when I was just a teenager in grade 10, I joined Antura Kiristna Apologetics Center where I gained a deeper understanding of biblical teachings.It did not only strengthened my faith in God but also inspired me to share the Good News with unbelivers.What made this journey even more special was getting a mentor who has been by my side every step of the way which continued to this day. I feel truly blessed by God to have been part of this ministry, and I want to thank everyone who has served us with such love and care. God bless you!

family1.name: Alemayehu Family
family1.content: We've seen such positive changes in our daughter since she joined Antura Kiristina. Her understanding of the Bible and her confidence in her faith have grown tremendously.

volunteer1.name: Yohannes Bekele
volunteer1.content: Volunteering with Antura Kiristina has been incredibly rewarding. Seeing the impact we're making in young lives and helping shape the future of our community is truly inspiring.

student2.name: Kidus Haile
student2.content: The friendships I've made at Antura Kiristina are unlike any others. We support each other in our faith journeys and have so much fun learning together.

family2.name: Tessema Family
family2.content: Antura Kiristina provides a safe and nurturing environment for our son to explore his faith. We're grateful for the dedicated staff and their commitment to our children's spiritual growth.

volunteer2.name: Martha Gebre
volunteer2.content: As a volunteer, I've grown in my own faith while helping guide these amazing young people. The energy and passion of the students is contagious and inspiring.

registrationSuccess.title: Registration Successful!
registrationSuccess.message: Thank you for registering. Our team will be in touch with you soon to discuss the next steps.
